about.title: About me
about.description1: Hello, I'm Thiago Rodrigues, Front-end Developer focused on React, TypeScript and Next.js.
about.description2: I have over 6 years of experience creating modern, performant and scalable interfaces, always applying best practices and focusing on user experience.
